code_config.code:
# Generate charts and visualizations
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

# Market size evolution
years = [2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024]
market_size = [45.2, 52.1, 61.3, 72.8, 87.5]

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(years, market_size, marker='o', linewidth=2)
plt.title('Market Size Evolution ($B)', fontsize=14)
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Market Size ($B)')
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.savefig('market_size.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')

# Competitive landscape
companies = ['Company A', 'Company B', 'Company C', 'Others']
market_share = [35, 28, 22, 15]
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 8))
plt.pie(market_share, labels=companies, autopct='%1.1f%%')
plt.title('Market Share Distribution')
plt.savefig('market_share.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
